description: Bug fix release for HBase-1.3 branch

issues.title: Port HBASE-10205 (ConcurrentModificationException in BucketAllocator) to branch-1

Eliminate the findbugs warnings for hbase-client

Eliminate the findbugs warnings for hbase-rest

Backport HBASE-16815 to branch-1.3
Backport HBASE-16985 to branch-1.3

Address issues found by error-prone in hbase-hadoop2-compat
temporarily make the mvnsite nightly test non-voting.

Classes used only for tests included in main code base
TableSnapshotScanner and TableSnapshotInputFormat can produce duplicate rows

Fix flaky TestScannerHeartbeatMessages
Inconsistent results from the Get/Scan if we use the empty FilterList
ExportSnapshot: set owner and permission on right directory

Avoid livelock caused by HRegion#processRowsWithLocks
Fix hbase-assembly build with bash 4
precommit test "hadoopcheck" not properly testing Hadoop 3 profile

Fix bookkeeping error with max regions for a table

Condition that always returns true

Inline package manage updates with package installation in Yetus Dockerfile
Make sure we always return the scanner id with ScanResponse

ProtobufUtil seems to do extra array copying

Update JUnit license to EPL from CPL
The way we process connection preamble in SimpleRpcServer is broken

Deletion of a cell deletes the previous versions too
The flush may cause the corrupt data for reading
Use OpenJDK7 instead of Oracle JDK7 in pre commit docker file

Possible connection leak while closing BufferedMutator in TableOutputFormat
